trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone"></xref> controls.
EditorZoneDesigner provides design-time rendering of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> controls.
It includes support for editable designer regions, templates, and auto-formats to allow a page developer to easily alter the appearance of the control.

The public <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collections provide quick formatting options for the page developer and can be safely overridden to change the default appearance of a custom control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
The AutoFormats property overrides its base implementation to return a collection for use with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> controls.
A pre-specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> with a default EditorZone scheme.
Invokes <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with a null parameter.
A <xref:System.String> that represents the markup of the control at design time.
Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref>, if any, associated with the control.
A <xref:System.String> that represents the markup of the control at design time.
Gets the content for the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
The specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
A <xref:System.String> that represents the persisted form of the designer region's content.
Gets the markup to represent an empty control.
An empty <xref:System.String>.
Binds the designer to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone"></xref> control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone"></xref> control associated with the designer.
Sets the content of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
The specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref>.
A <xref:System.String> that represents the content to go in the specified region.
Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
The TemplateGroups property overrides its base implementation to return a collection for use with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> controls.
A pre-specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> with default settings for an EditorZone environment.
